description: This table contains hospital account information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file. This second hospital account table has the same basic structure as HSP_ACCOUNT, but was created as a second table to prevent HSP_ACCOUNT from getting any larger. This table will exclude professional billing HARs created by visit filing order in non-single billing office service areas.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: HH_AGENCY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The home health agency associated with the hospital account.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EXPIRATION_REASON
columns.description: The reason for expiration (anesthesia, operation, etc.).  If the discharge disposition is not "expired," this field will not be populated.

columns.name: DECEASED_DT
columns.description: Date of patient's death.

columns.name: DECEASED_TIME
columns.description: The date and time for the death of the patient that is associated with this hospital account.

columns.name: DURATIONS_HYPERAL
columns.description: This column stores the number of days patient is on Hyperal. Hyperal is the same as Total Parenteral Nutrition (TPN) regarding diet and nutrition management.

columns.name: OPEN_DENIAL_BDC_YN
columns.description:
This column stores whether the hospital account has an open denial record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: OPEN_RMK_BDC_YN
columns.description:
This column stores whether the hospital account has an open remark record.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OPEN_DENIAL_BDC_YN

columns.name: OPEN_COR_BDC_YN
columns.description:
This column stores whether the hospital account has an open correspondence record.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OPEN_DENIAL_BDC_YN

columns.name: ECMO
columns.description: This column stores the number of days the patient has been using the ECMO (extracorporeal membrane oxygenation) equipment.

columns.name: MECHANICAL_VENT
columns.description: The number of days the patient has been using the mechanical ventilator.

columns.name: ARCHIVE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the archive record of the hospital account.

columns.name: ARCHIVE_DT
columns.description: The date the hospital account was archived.

columns.name: REC_CREATE_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who created the hospital account.

columns.name: REGIONAL_STUDY_1
columns.description: This column stores the Regional study 1, which is one of the coding info items.

columns.name: REGIONAL_STUDY_2
columns.description: This column stores the Regional study 2, which is one of the coding info items.

columns.name: FACILITY_STUDY_A
columns.description: Facility study A is one of the coding info items. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display these items.

columns.name: FACILITY_STUDY_B
columns.description: Facility study B is one of the coding info items. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display these items.

columns.name: DECUBITIS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Decubitis is one of the coding info items. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display these items.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


One


Two


Three


Four

columns.name: TRAUMA_C_NAME
columns.description:
Trauma is one of the coding info items. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display these items.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


One


Two


Three


Four


Five


Six


Seven


Eight


Nine


Ten

columns.name: GEST_AGE_DAYS
columns.description: Gestational age days is one of the coding info items. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display these items.

columns.name: GEST_AGE_BABY_DAYS
columns.description: Gestational (baby) age days is one of the coding info items. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display these items.

columns.name: ESOP_PAYOR_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the expected source of payment payer, which is a coding info item that stores the payer that is expected to pay for the services. This item is necessary for regulatory reporting in some states. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display this item.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ESOP_PLAN_NAME_C_NAME
columns.description:
Expected source of payment plan name is one of the coding info items. It stores the plan that is expected to pay for the services. This item is necessary for regulatory reporting in some states. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display coding items.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ESOP_PLAN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Expected source of payment plan type is one of the coding info items. It stores the type of plan that is expected to pay for the services. This item is necessary for regulatory reporting in some states. The abstract info tab in account maintenance can be configured to display coding items.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CODING_USER
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who last changed the coding status of the hospital account. This is frequently used to join to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: APGAR_10_MIN
columns.description: The Apgar score at ten minutes for the newborn associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.

columns.name: FRST_PRO_STMT_DT
columns.description: This field contains the date of the first non-demand enterprise statement to be sent with a self-pay proration balance.

columns.name: LST_PRO_STMT_DT
columns.description: This field contains the date of the most recent non-demand enterprise statement to be sent with a self-pay proration balance.

columns.name: NUM_PRO_STMTS
columns.description: This field contains the total number of non-demand enterprise statements sent with a self-pay proration balance.

columns.name: FRST_PRO_D_STMT_DT
columns.description: This field contains the date of the first demand enterprise statement to be sent with a self-pay proration balance.

columns.name: LST_PRO_D_STMT_DT
columns.description: This field contains the date of the most recent demand enterprise statement to be sent with a self-pay proration balance.

columns.name: NUM_PRO_D_STMTS
columns.description: This field contains the total number of demand enterprise statements sent with a self-pay proration balance.

columns.name: FRST_FULL_STMT_DT
columns.description: This field contains the date of the first non-demand enterprise statement to be sent where the remaining account balance is completely self-pay.

columns.name: LST_FULL_STMT_DT
columns.description: This field contains the date of the most recent non-demand enterprise statement to be sent where the remaining account balance is completely self-pay.

columns.name: NUM_FULL_STMTS
columns.description: This field contains the total number of non-demand enterprise statements sent where the remaining account balance is completely self-pay.

columns.name: FST_FULL_D_STMT_DT
columns.description: This field contains the date of the first demand enterprise statement to be sent where the remaining account balance is completely self-pay.

columns.name: LST_FULL_D_STMT_DT
columns.description: This field contains the date of the most recent demand enterprise statement to be sent where the remaining account balance is completely self-pay.

columns.name: NUM_FULL_D_STMTS
columns.description: This field contains the total number of demand enterprise statements sent where the remaining account balance is completely self-pay.

columns.name: FIRST_SELF_PAY_DT
columns.description: This field contains the date of the first self-pay balance for this account.

columns.name: FIRST_FULL_SP_DT
columns.description: This field contains the first date when the self-pay balance equaled the full account balance for this account.

columns.name: STILLBORN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a pregnancy resulted in a stillbirth. This is an abstracting item.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OPEN_DENIAL_BDC_YN

columns.name: NUM_LIVE_BIRTHS
columns.description: This column contains the abstracted number of children that were born alive for the hospital account encounter.

columns.name: FIRST_INFO_STMT_DT
columns.description: This field contains the date of the first non-demand enterprise statement to be sent with no self-pay balance (only insurance balance).

columns.name: LAST_INFO_STMT_DT
columns.description: This field contains the date of the most recent non-demand enterprise statement to be sent with no self-pay balance (only insurance balance).

columns.name: LAST_D_INFO_STM_DT
columns.description: This field contains the date of the most recent demand enterprise statement to be sent with no self-pay balance (only insurance balance).

columns.name: NUM_D_INFO_STMTS
columns.description: This field contains the total number of demand enterprise statements sent with no self-pay balance (only insurance balance).

columns.name: FARM_ACCIDENT_YN
columns.description:
This column stores whether or not the hospital account was abstracted as a farm accident. 0-No or 1-Yes.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OPEN_DENIAL_BDC_YN

columns.name: EXTERN_AR_FLAG_YN
columns.description:
External A/R Flag. This flag determines if an account's A/R is to be counted as belonging to an external agency (i.e., as bad debt). This flag is set by a collections action and can be unset by another action. This flag is only used if external agency A/R has been enabled.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active AR


External Agency AR


Bad Debt


Outsourced

columns.name: PRIMARY_CONTACT
columns.description: This column stores the primary contact date (DAT) of the hospital account. It's used in many places, such as in determining the admission/discharge date of the account.

columns.name: NUM_STILLBORNS
columns.description: This column contains the abstracted number of stillborns for the hospital account.

columns.name: HOSP_INFECTION_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient developed a hospital infection during the hospital account encounter.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OPEN_DENIAL_BDC_YN

columns.name: RAPID_RESP_TEAM_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a rapid response team was needed during the hospital account encounter.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OPEN_DENIAL_BDC_YN

columns.name: RETURN_TO_OR_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient was returned to operating room. This is an abstracting item.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OPEN_DENIAL_BDC_YN

columns.name: NONCVRD_SNF_STAY_YN
columns.description:
This column stores whether the Skilled Nursing Facility (SNF) stay billed on this account is non-covered due to not having a prior qualifying inpatient stay.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OPEN_DENIAL_BDC_YN
